patthana15.44:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.44:1.1_0: They don’t give rise to the mind consciousness, which is skillful. for the sake of the mind, not for the sake of causes.’ ...
patthana15.44:2.1_0: They don’t give rise to the mind. Their mind doesn’t give rise to the thought. ...
patthana15.44:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
